metaData.label: Visitados
metaData.criteriaDescription: My_Target_vod__C equal 1 AND ( MSD_CORE_Sales_Team__c equal BR_VACINAS + IMPLANON PRIV OR MSD_CORE_Sales_Team__c equal BR_ROTATEQ )

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="AND" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.My_Target_vod__C" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[1]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.MSD_CORE_Sales_Team__c" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[BR_VACINAS + IMPLANON PRIV]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition><Condition Key="TSF_CRM_Profiles DMR.MSD_CORE_Sales_Team__c" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><AttributePath RelationshipID="c7da84c7-63fd-ec11-a31b-1402ec938a8d"><Value><![CDATA[BR_ROTATEQ]]></Value></AttributePath></Condition></ConditionSet></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>

metaData.label: Sao Paulo
metaData.criteriaDescription: licenseNumber begins with SP OR addressCity equal Sao Paulo OR addressCity equal São Paulo OR addressState equal Sao Paulo OR addressState equal São Paulo

criteria.default_path_1: <FilterDefinition><ConditionSet Operator="OR" ConditionSetName="Individual Filter Grouping"><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.licenseNumber" Operator="Begins" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[SP]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressCity" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[Sao Paulo]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressCity" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[São Paulo]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressState" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[Sao Paulo]]></Value></Condition><Condition Key="Digital Identity Hub Profiles.addressState" Operator="Equal" UiMetaData="{"groupToSetRelationshipId":"10fe9625-d0db-e911-a2d6-1402ec938a51"}"><Value><![CDATA[São Paulo]]></Value></Condition></ConditionSet></FilterDefinition>
